name: subteam_self_added
desc: You have been added to a User Group.
long_desc: My Slack API Start here App features Messages APIs Slack App Directory Authentication Keep in touch Community You have been added to a User Group  				Compatibility:									RTM 													Events API 							  					Scopes:					usergroups:read 				 The subteam_self_added event is sent to you when you have been added to an existing User Group. Clients can use this to update their local list of User Groups. This event is not available to bot user subscriptions in the Events API.
